properties.name: hbase.hadoopDir
properties.description: hadoopDir 的安装地址(D://installer/hadoop-2.7.7) 位置.

properties.name: hbase.zookeeperPort
properties.description: zk的访问端口.

properties.name: hbase.loginUser
properties.description: 登录的用户名.

properties.name: hbase.loginPass
properties.description: 登录的密码.

properties.name: hbase.master
properties.description: master主机地址.

properties.name: hbase.pool.maxTotal
properties.description: 池中最大链接数,默认是8.

properties.name: hbase.pool.maxIdle
properties.description: 池中最大空闲链接数目,默认是8.

properties.name: hbase.pool.minIdle
properties.description: 池中最小空闲链接数目,默认为0.

properties.name: hbase.pool.maxWaitMillis
properties.description: 当链接池资源耗尽时,等待时间,超出抛异常,默认为-1,阻塞.

properties.name: hbase.pool.testOnCreate
properties.description: 默认是false,创建一个链接时检测是否链接有效,无效则剔除,并尝试继续获取新链接.

properties.name: hbase.pool.testOnBorrow
properties.description: 默认是false,借取一个链接时检测是否有效,无效则剔除,并尝试继续获取新链接。.

properties.name: hbase.pool.testOnReturn
properties.description: 默认为false,归还一个对象时检测是否有效,无效则不放入链接池内。.

properties.name: hbase.pool.testWhileIdle
properties.description: 默认为false,指明空闲链接是否需要被【空闲链接回收器】【evict方法】检测,检测出链接无效则被移除。.

properties.name: hbase.pool.timeBetweenEvictionRunsMillis
properties.description: 空闲链接回收器运行的周期,单位ms,默认-1,永不执行检测.

properties.name: hbase.pool.numTestsPerEvictionRun
properties.description: 空闲链接回收器运行时检查的空闲链接数量,默认是3个.

properties.name: hive.userName
properties.description: hive的登录名称.

properties.name: hive.userPass
properties.description: hive的登录密码.

properties.name: hive.hiveDriver
properties.description: hive的连接的driver的名称.

properties.name: hive.hiveUrl
properties.description: hive的连接的地址,访问的url.

properties.name: hive.pool.maxTotal
properties.description: 池中最大链接数,默认是8.

properties.name: hive.pool.maxIdle
properties.description: 池中最大空闲链接数目,默认是8.

properties.name: hive.pool.minIdle
properties.description: 池中最小空闲链接数目,默认为0.

properties.name: hive.pool.maxWaitMillis
properties.description: 当链接池资源耗尽时,等待时间,超出抛异常,默认为-1,阻塞.

properties.name: hive.pool.testOnCreate
properties.description: 默认是false,创建一个链接时检测是否链接有效,无效则剔除,并尝试继续获取新链接.

properties.name: hive.pool.testOnBorrow
properties.description: 默认是false,借取一个链接时检测是否有效,无效则剔除,并尝试继续获取新链接。.

properties.name: hive.pool.testOnReturn
properties.description: 默认为false,归还一个对象时检测是否有效,无效则不放入链接池内。.

properties.name: hive.pool.testWhileIdle
properties.description: 默认为false,指明空闲链接是否需要被【空闲链接回收器】【evict方法】检测,检测出链接无效则被移除。.

properties.name: hive.pool.timeBetweenEvictionRunsMillis
properties.description: 空闲链接回收器运行的周期,单位ms,默认-1,永不执行检测.

properties.name: hive.pool.numTestsPerEvictionRun
properties.description: 空闲链接回收器运行时检查的空闲链接数量,默认是3个.
